attributes.action: To recognise Tom Baker, for his services to the entertainment industry
attributes.additional_details:
Tom Baker (Thomas Stewart "Tom" Baker) has been entertaining this country and the rest of the world for 45 years.

He is best known for playing the role as 4th Doctor in Doctor Who, which is watched all over the world today, which is an achievement to say as he played this role in 1974 to 1981.

He's also starred in films, Television, theatre, video games and radio.

Tom Baker's voice is the fourth most recognisable after the Queen, Tony Blair and Margaret Thatcher.

I think the UK, should recognise, this great British actor in some way, for all the enjoyment he has bought to so many of us in this country and the world!
